item.title: Hugo+Github个人笔记部署简易教程
item.description: hugo笔记部署 sudo apt install hugo -y hugo new site dcqwiki cd dcqwiki git git submodule add https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even/tree/v4.0.0https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even hugo server 本地访问localhost:1313 编译：hugo github创建仓库 名字和github名字一样 勾选publi和Readme cd public git init -b main git remote add origin git@github.com:dev960/dev960.github.io.git git pull –rebase origin main git add .
